api

Class LibgdxScreen

  • Object
    • LibgdxScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameLogic, InputAdapter, InputProcessor, Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameScreen, TestScreen

    public abstract class LibgdxScreen
extends Object
implements Screen, InputAdapter, IGameLogic
    Il s'agit d'un écran du jeu mais qui remplit toutes les fonctionnalités d'un jeu entier : phase initialisation et libération et la gameloop.

    Les méthodes de la libgdx sont cachés au mieux.

    Since:
    03 december 2019
    Version:
    03 december 2019
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
    See Also:
    listen(InputProcessor), InputAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public abstract void display(boolean display)
        Cache l'écran mais les évènements doivent continuer d'être capturés

        setVisible ou addAction(Actions.hide()) et addAction(Actions.show()) devrait suffire sur les stages

        Parameters:
        display - true pour cacher l'écran sinon false
        Since:
        3.0 03 december 2019

      • listen

        protected void listen(InputProcessor stage)
        When a event happens, if no one before was concerned by the event, all stage's observers will be called.

        Warning! The events are called in the same order listens call were done.

        So it would be wise to call listen on hud's stage before main's stage for instance.

        Parameters:
        stage - the stage witch should be adverted of events
        Since:
        3.0 03 december 2019

      • getListened

        public Iterator<InputProcessor> getListened()
        Return all listened stages. They could be removed.
        Returns:
        all listened stages.
        Since:
        3.0 03 december 2019
